thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Anthem To Make $1,000 Contribution To 401(K) Accounts Of More Than 58,000 Associates And Recent Retirees

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Anthem To Make $1,000 Contribution To 401(K) Accounts Of More Than 58,000 Associates And Recent Retirees
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Anthem Inc:
* ANTHEM INC TO MAKE $1,000 CONTRIBUTION TO 401(K) ACCOUNTS OF MORE THAN 58,000 ASSOCIATES AND RECENT RETIREES
* HAS CREATED THIS NEW INVESTMENT PROGRAM FOR ASSOCIATES FOLLOWING REVISIONS TO U.S. TAX CODE THAT WERE ENACTED EARLIER THIS YEAR
* FULL-TIME, PART-TIME, TEMPORARY ASSOCIATES AND RECENT RETIREES ARE ELIGIBLE TO RECEIVE 401(K) CONTRIBUTIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
